questions.question: Crankshafts can also be machined out of a billet, often using a bar of high quality vacuum remelted steel:
Which material is used in the simulation of crankshaft for making crankshaft:
The temperature of the billet at the starting of impression die forging in the simulation is:
The configuration and number of pistons in relation to each other and the crank leads to straight, V or _________:
For some engines it is necessary to provide counterweights for the reciprocating mass of each piston and connecting rod to improve ________:
